title: Electric flux - flux through shape w-nonuniform E

content.question: A rectangle is located in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane as shown in the figure. There is a nonuniform electric field that, in the area occupied by the rectangle, is in the <math alttext="positive z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>+</mo><mi>z</mi></mpadded></math>-direction and has a magnitude <math alttext="E of x equals, a plus b x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>E</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></math>, where <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math> and <math alttext="b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>b</mi></math> are positive constants with appropriate units. What is the electric flux through the rectangle?

choices.label: <math alttext="2 x sub 0, end sub, y sub 0, end sub, a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>a</mi></math>
<math alttext="2 x sub 0, end sub, y sub 0, end sub, b" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>b</mi></math>

<math alttext="2 x sub 0, end sub, y sub 0, end sub, times, open parenthesis, a plus b x sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

<math alttext="2 x sub 0, end sub, y sub 0, end sub, times, open parenthesis, a plus 2 b x sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 x sub 0, end sub, y sub 0, end sub, times, open parenthesis, a plus 2 b x sub 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
